# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is RABBIT.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<Reasoning> I will start by contributing a small amount to see how the others behave. </Reasoning>
<CHAT> Hello everyone, let's see how this goes! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
RABBIT: Hello everyone, let's see how this goes!
MONKEY: Hi everyone! Let's cooperate.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>

<Reasoning> I will contribute 5 coins to the pot. </Reasoning>
<CONTRIB> 15 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="35" multiplied_contrib="66.5" active_players="3" redistributed_each="22.2"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> MONKEY=10,GORILLA=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 12.0 coins. Choose whom to punish and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<Reasoning> I will not punish anyone this round, as it's the first round, and I want to see how they behave over time. </Reasoning>
<PUNISHMENT> {} </PUNISHMENT>

<Reasoning> I will contribute 10 coins as the results of the first round were decent, and I want to see if they will continue to cooperate. </Reasoning>
